#summary How to create and use Templates
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Templates are located in 
{{{
\%UserName%\Documents\Applications\Torrent Description Maker\Templates
}}}

By default there will 3 Templates installed: Default, Minimal and MTN. 

= Supported Syntax =

== Styles == 

%FontSize_Heading1%
%FontSize_Heading2%
%FontSize_Heading3%
%FontSize_Body%

== Disc.txt and File.txt == 

 * *%Source%* = Place holder for Source
 * *%Disc_Authoring%* = Place holder 
 * *%Disc_Menu%* = Place holder for 
 * *%Disc_Extras%* = Place holder for GeneralInfo.txt
 * *%WebLink%* = Place holder for DiscAudioInfo.txt

 * *%General_Info%* = Place holder for GeneralInfo.txt
 * *%Audio_Info%* = Place holder for DiscAudioInfo.txt
 * *%Video_Info%* = Place holder for FileVideoInfo.txt or DiscVideoInfo.txt

Apart from these syntaxes both files support all the syntaxes listed below. However when Audio syntaxes are used, the syntaxes match to the first available audio stream of the media file.

 * *%Audio_Format%*
 * *%Audio_Bitrate%*
 * *%Audio_Channels%*
 * *%Audio_SamplingRate%*
 * *%Audio_Resolution%*

== FileAudioInfo.txt and DiscAudioInfo.txt ==

 * *%AudioID%* = Stream number of Audio - useful for sources with multiple audio

 * *%Audio_Resolution%*

 * *%Video_Format%*
 * *%Video_Bitrate%*

 * *%Video_FrameRate%*
 * *%Video_ScanType%*
